author: Special Correspondent
text:
A delegation from National Defence College in New Delhi, comprising senior officers of the Armed forces and civilian officials of several countries called on Governor K. Rosaiah here on Monday. The 17-member team was led by Commandant of the National Defence College Lt. Gen. N.S. Ghei, an official release from the Raj Bhavan stated.

The officials from Afghanistan, Bangladesh, Brazil, Israel, Nigeria and South Korea were among the delegates who called on the Governor.
title: Team from NDC calls on Governor
